name: Juno's Special Vitality Stew
description: Upon taking a hit, there is a {0}% chance to increase All DMG the target takes by {2}% for {1} sec. This effect cannot be used with other similar effects cast by allies.
story: A healthy stew made with the healthy ingredients all over from Orbis. Having full of minerals and other nutrients, it is a powerful dish that can restore the vitality of anyone who eats it. The price is not too expensive, which makes it available for everyone. This is Juno's specialty dish full of love and her pride for the weary ones visiting the Hero's Inn.
